title: Need help changing my email
body: Hi guys, I need help changing my verified email. I logged in to my account after a very long time and I felt like I need to change the email. However after typing the new email and my password it tells me to verify the passcode but I think they are sending the passcode to my old email because I am not receiving the passcode on the new email. Is there something I can do to change my email because I lost my old email.

replies.body: No worries, we can help!  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help you update your account info.
